pages.text: Snipe's as the name suggests, are a flying mob that will at all times stay 25 blocks away from their target and snipe them down from a distance. It is best you just run if you happen to come across one of these unless you happen to have good long range attacking skills. They also hate Cosmo's for some reason...
Snipe's are found in a Comatose within the Delusion, Immaterial and Spectral biomes
